rRACES 0.0.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

    TINC

    rRACES is the R wrapper for RACES, a C++ tumour evolution simulator.

    Help and support

    Installation

    You can install the released version of TINC with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("caravagnalab/rRACES")

    of you can build the package locally

    git clone https://github.com/caravagnalab/rRACES.git
R CMD build rRACES
R CMD install rRACES_*.tar.gz
